text: Willis Forko (12 November 1983 – 8 November 2021) was a Liberian-American footballer. He played for the national team once in 2010. His career began in 2002 and he retired in 2012. Forko died on 8 November 2021, three days before his 38th birthday.Tidligere Glimt-spiller (37) er død ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Liberian footballers Category:American soccer players
title: Willis Forko
